Weather: Snow for North Island, Auckland frosts possible in winter-like forecast https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-snow-for-north-island-auckland-frosts-possible-in-winter-like-forecast/BVXNSZDLLRAQHFNFCMDMKOKYJA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-snow-for-north-island-auckland-frosts-possible-in-winter-like-forecast/BVXNSZDLLRAQHFNFCMDMKOKYJA/ Raphael FranksAuckland temps are set to drop to 6C tonight, with tomorrow night being even cooler at 4C.
